abilities.name: Synchronized Lift
abilities.text: As long as you have Zapdos ex and Moltres ex in play, the Retreat Cost for Articuno ex is 0.

attacks.name: Ice Gift
attacks.text: You may move a Water Energy card attached to Articuno ex to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Freezing Wing
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
